name: Benjamin Smith
description: I am happy and enjoy life. I’m genuine, what you see is what you get,I wear my heart on my sleeve,not into playing games. You know exactly where you stand with me. No use beating around the bush. I believe that no-one is perfect, I love affection, attention,and surprises,I am a giver, not a taker, and enjoy making my partner happy, and content. i always try to go that extra mile, to keep the relationship exciting and surprising, fun and romantic.I love to have a good laugh whether its at myself or something else. I’m honest.and respect others. I believe in treating others as you would want to be treated
